model.label: BSM Signed Snapshot
model.description: A signed snapshot of data from different model instances
model.notes: See notes on 'St' for snapshot creation.

point.label: Snapshot Type
point.description: Which snapshot type is represented by this model instance

symbol.label: Signed Current Snapshot
symbol.description: Signed snapshot of the current meter data at the time of its creation
symbol.notes: Creating this snapshot just collects and signs the data. No further action is taken.

symbol.label: Signed Turn-On Snapshot
symbol.description: Signed snapshot created during executing the turn-on sequence for an external contactor
symbol.notes: Creating this snapshot executes the turn-on sequence for an external contactor. Its data is taken with the contactor turned off.

symbol.label: Signed Turn-Off Snapshot
symbol.description: Signed snapshot created during the execution of the turn-off sequence for an external contactor
symbol.notes: Creating this snapshot executes the turn-on sequence for an external contactor. Its data is taken after turning the contactor off.

point.label: Snapshot Status
point.notes: Write 'UPDATING' to this data point for triggering the creation of a new snapshot. Poll this data points afterwards until its value changes to something different from 'UPDATING'.

symbol.label: Snapshot Data Valid
symbol.description: The model instance contains valid signed data of a snapshot

symbol.label: Snapshot Data Invalid
symbol.description: Snapshot data is invalid. This is the case after powering on the meter.

symbol.label: Snapshot Data Gets Updated
symbol.description: The snapshot gets currently updated. Snapshot data is invalid.
symbol.notes: Write this value to trigger the creation of a new snapshot. Afterwards poll this data point until its value changes to a different symbol indicating the outcome of the update process.

symbol.label: Snapshot Creation Failed For Unspecified Reason
symbol.description: Creating the snapshot failed for an unspecified reason (for example an internal error). Snapshot data is invalid.

symbol.label: Snapshot Creation Failed For Unspecified Reason
symbol.description: Creating the snapshot failed for an unspecified reason (for example an internal error)

symbol.label: Snapshot Creation Failed Due To Missing Enable Signal
symbol.description: Creating the snapshot failed due to a missing enable signal (DOE)
symbol.notes: This could happen when attempting to create a turn-on snapshot.

symbol.label: Snapshot Creation Failed Due Missing/Wrong Contactor Feedback
symbol.description: Creating the snapshot failed due to missing or wrong feedback from the external contactor (through DI).

point.label: Total Watt-hours Exported
point.notes: This value is taken from AC meter model 203.
This value is taken from AC meter model 203.

point.label: Watts
point.notes: This value is taken from AC meter model 203.
This value is taken from AC meter model 203.

point.label: Meter Address 1
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Response Counter
point.description: A counter incremented with each snapshot
point.notes: This is a counter which gets incremented with each created snapshot and used among all snapshot instances. You can find the last assigned value in the BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Operation-Seconds Counter
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Current Epoch Time
point.description: Current local time in seconds since 1970
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Timezone Offset
point.description: Timezone offset of local epoch time time to UTC
point.notes: Positive values refer to time zones east/ahead of UTC, negative values to time zones west/behind of UTC. This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Time Set Counter
point.description: How many time epoch time and timezone offset have been set
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Time Last Set At Operation-Seconds
point.description: Operation-seconds when the time has been set the last time
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Input State
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Output State
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Inputs Last Changed At Operation-Seconds
point.description: The point in time (operation-seconds) when the digital inputs changed last
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Inputs Last Changed At Epoch Time
point.description: The point in time (epoch time) when the digital inputs changed last
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Inputs Last Changed Timezone Offset
point.description: The timezone offset when digital input changed last
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Outputs Last Changed At Operation-Seconds
point.description: The point in time (operation-seconds) when the digital outputs changed last
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Outputs Last Changed At Epoch Time
point.description: The point in time (epoch time) when the digital outputs changed last
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Digital Outputs Last Changed Timezone Offset
point.description: The timezone offset when digital outputs changed last
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Metadata 1
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Metadata 2
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Metadata 3
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Metadata 3
point.notes: This value is taken from BSM meter model 64900.

point.label: Number Of Signature Registers
point.description: The number of registers comprising the snapshot signature

point.label: Events
point.notes: This value is taken from AC meter model 203.

symbol.label: Meter Fatal Error
symbol.description: The meter module reported a fatal error
symbol.notes:
This bit summarizes the meter module's error status 'Err' from BSM model (64900). It gets set when this value differs from 0000000.
This is a fatal error. Values returned by the device are no longer guaranteed to be valid.

symbol.label: Communication Module Startup Initialization Failed
symbol.notes: This is a fatal error. Values returned by the device are no longer guaranteed to be valid. Do not consider signed data as authentic.

symbol.label: Communication Module Firmware Hash Mismatch
symbol.notes: This is a fatal error. Values returned by the device are no longer guaranteed to be valid. Do not consider signed data as authentic.

symbol.label: Communication Module in Development Mode
symbol.notes: This is a device in development mode. Do not consider signed data as authentic.

point.label: Digital Signature
point.notes: The signature covers all registers from its block. The first NSig/2 registers contain r, the last NSig/2 registers contain s in big endian order.
